Summary: appeared near star like metior but changed directions and weaved around stars.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Sumner
There were no other sightings in Sumner on or around May 6th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsAt first I thought it was a meteorite but when observed with binoculars, object made a 180 and weaved around stars. Very bright like shooting star but after turning became less intense and moved southeast over Mount Rainier. Too fast for a satellite also manuvered.
